alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Blaine...western Oneida...southwestern Power...Cassia and southern Minidoka Counties through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1114 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Burley to 11 miles southeast of Almo. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Malta, Lake Walcott, Oakley Reservoir, Paul, Oakley, Declo, Rockland, Albion, Juniper, Cold Water Rest Area, Elba, Almo, Yale Rest Area, City Of Rocks, Sweetzer Summit, Bostetter Ranger Station and Sublett Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
